scripts.docker:psql: docker compose exec db psql -U valuebooks -d valuebooks
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec db psql -U valuebooks -d valuebooks -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/001_create_users.sql && docker compose exec db psql -U valuebooks -d valuebooks -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/002_create_roles.sql && docker compose exec db psql -U valuebooks -d valuebooks -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/003_create_refresh_tokens.sql && docker compose exec db psql -U valuebooks -d valuebooks -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/004_seed_system_roles.sql
scripts.db:reset: docker compose --profile db down -v && docker compose --profile db up -d
